- Performance Improvements.
- Bug fixes.

Previous updates
- Creativity and innovation always feed off each other, which is Luwian's primary vision. Luwian's new cutting-edge Third EYE feature will help you design the perfect frame by quantifying and visualizing where people are likely to look in an image. To activate the Third EYE feature, use the eye button in photography mode.
cn.description:
Luwian 是一款复杂的相机应用程序，旨在提供对相机硬件的完全手动控制，从而使用户能够使用 DSLR 设计释放他们的创造力。此外，该应用程序还附带 Luwian Raw Magic Lite 后处理编辑器，可提高图像质量。

Luwian 提供的手动控制包括曝光、对焦、对焦锁定、变焦和白平衡，以及预设和自定义调整选项、ISO 和快门速度。该应用程序还提供对 40 个滤镜、29 个虚拟 FX、17 个模拟电影和 36 个经典电影色调的访问，这些都可以在主相机面板上轻松使用。

Luwian 是业余和专业摄影师的强大工具，提供一系列功能，使他们能够轻松捕捉令人惊叹的图像。其直观的界面确保用户可以轻松导航应用程序并访问其功能，而其手动控件使他们能够对相机硬件进行精确控制。借助 Luwian，摄影师可以精确、清晰地捕捉他们的视觉，使其成为摄影领域人士的理想工具。

主要面板特点：

曝光控制
对焦+对焦锁定控制
飞涨
白平衡
国际标准化组织
快门速度
目标网格
全屏
方位指示器
当前分辨率指示器
手电筒模式：自动/开/关
闪光模式：自动/开/关
相机切换菜单
录像切换按钮：普通/慢动作/延时
快门按钮
视频录制按钮
双摄像头录制模式（仅限 iPhone 11 及更高版本）
真实深度背景相机（仅限 iPhone 11 及更高版本）
快门定时器
手动模式
自动模式
人像模式（仅限 iPhone 11 及更高版本）
模拟电影模式
电影色调滤镜模式
经典滤镜和视觉特效
菜单
卢维安原始魔法精简版


所有 Raw Magic Lite 功能：

导入/选择/删除
媒体 EXIF 信息和详细信息
照片编辑裁剪调整大小
视频编辑裁剪调整大小（测试版）
照片/视频调整
照片/视频通用滤镜和视觉特效
照片/视频模拟滤镜
照片/视频电影色调滤镜


所有设置功能：

照片质量设置
相机预设访问和视频录制 FPS 设置
延时摄影速度 2 倍至 10 倍
打开和关闭主面板过滤器视图
快门定时器设置为三秒。至 15 秒。
关于部分和支持页面的链接

cn.trackName: 生辰 — 桌面时间小组件
cn.description:
这是一款关于生、死、心愿与延续的App。

小时候，我以为自己是不会老去的彼得·潘，却终究敌不过健康磨损，容颜老去。
时针转动，生命流逝，但每一次心跳都可以更加有力。

有时候，生命只是一连串的数字，多少年，多少月，多少小时，多少分钟。当你意识到这个时，往往陷入巨大的虚无感之中，惶恐不能自拔。
而现在，这些数字可以成为你重塑生命的坐标，指引你走向更健康、更长久的未来。

生辰 2.0 通过 AI 分析和科学判断，不仅预测生命的终点，更为你铺就延长生命的道路：

- 探索你的生命时钟：了解当下的预期寿命，直面生命的有限与珍贵。
- 发现延寿的可能：看见改变健康习惯能为你带来多少额外的生命时光。
- 聚合健康数据：自动追踪睡眠、锻炼、压力（HRV）、经期、喝水等十余种健康数据

美国诗人纳·斯待尔在87岁那年写道：
"如果我能够从头活过，我会试着犯更多的错。
我会放松一点，我会灵活一点。
我会爬更多的山，游更多的河，看更多的日落。"

因为了解生命的终点，才能更好地珍惜当下的每一刻。生辰2.0 探索健康的可能，让我们成为你健康旅程的长久伙伴。

【生辰 App 会员服务说明】

1.会员包含几种订购类型
订阅周期：1个月、3个月、12个月
2.首次订购后会通过iTunes账户直接支付；账户会在到期前24小时内扣费，扣费成功后自动顺延一个订阅周期
3.本服务由您自主选择是否续订，如需取消，请在订阅到期24小时前，在 AppleID 设置中取消
4.生辰App 会员协议
生辰App 会员服务协议：https://post.jellow.club/whatslife-payment/
5.生辰App 软件协议与隐私政策
生辰 软件许可及服务协议：https://post.jellow.club/whatslife-agreement/
生辰 隐私协议：https://post.jellow.club/whatslife-privacy/
cn.trackCensoredName: 生辰 — 桌面时间小组件

hk.releaseNotes:
• TWO LEVELS FREE: Play the first two levels of Lara’s Aztec adventure for free, then unlock levels 3-14 and all DLC via a single in-app purchase.
• Fixes a number of minor issues.
hk.description:
READ BEFORE DOWNLOADING: Please expand this description and read the full list of supported devices below to confirm that your device is supported.

TWO LEVELS FREE
Play the first two levels of Lara’s Aztec adventure for free, then unlock levels 3-14 and all DLC via a single in-app purchase.

===

Battle, platform and puzzle your way through the Mexican jungle in an action-packed tomb-raiding adventure. Explore temples, traverse toxic swamps and navigate volcanic caverns to defeat Xolotl, the Keeper of Darkness, before he plunges the world into eternal night.

DUAL PISTOLS AND TWIN STICKS
Carve a path through undead hordes in fast-paced combat, and bolster your arsenal with unlockable weapons and superpowered relics.

BRAIN TEASING AND CHASM LEAPING
Leap, grapple and swing your way past cunning puzzles and trap-laden challenges.

SOLO ACTION OR CO-OP CAPERS
Save the world solo or bring a friend for seamless multiplayer, via local network or online.

PICK UP AND PLAY — AGAIN AND AGAIN!
Beat high scores, tackle side objectives and discover hidden collectables on every level.

TOUCHSCREEN OR GAMEPAD CONTROLS
Customise the touchscreen controls to taste, or connect your favourite gamepad.

===

We recommend playing Lara Croft and the Guardian of Light on iOS 17 or later. You need 4GB of free space on your device, though we recommend at least double this to avoid initial installation issues.

Supported iPhones:  

 • iPhone XR and later
 • iPhone SE 2nd Generation (2020) and later

Supported iPads:  

 • iPad mini 5th Generation (2019) and later
 • iPad Air 3rd Generation (2019) and later
 • iPad 7th Generation (2019) and later
 • iPad Pro 2nd Generation (2017) and later

• If you require assistance, please contact our support team at support@feralinteractive.com

LARA CROFT AND THE GUARDIAN OF LIGHT © 2010, 2025 Crystal Dynamics group of companies. All rights reserved. LARA CROFT AND THE GUARDIAN OF LIGHT, THE GUARDIAN OF LIGHT, LARA CROFT, TOMB RAIDER, CRYSTAL DYNAMICS, and the CRYSTAL DYNAMICS logo are registered trademarks or trademarks of the Crystal Dynamics group of companies. Developed for and published on iOS by Feral Interactive Ltd. iOS and the iOS logo are trademarks of Apple Inc, registered in the U.S. and other countries. Feral and the Feral logo are trademarks of Feral Interactive Ltd. All other trademarks are the properties of their respective owners. All rights reserved.

偶爾/輕度的暴力卡通或幻想
hk.description:
Dawncaster: Epic Deck-Building Adventure

Dive into a world of strategy and magic in Dawncaster, the ultimate deck-building experience with over 900 stunning hand-illustrated cards. Will you become a shadow-dancing rogue, an indomitable warrior, a mysterious Seeker, or forge your own path? Unravel the dark secrets of Aethos in this tactical masterpiece that revolutionizes mobile card gaming.

Redefining Card Games

- Experience groundbreaking mechanics that seasoned players will love
- Blend unique class abilities with powerful weapons and enchantments
- Master an innovative energy system, freeing you from traditional deckbuilder constraints

A World Shrouded in Mystery

- Embark on a quest to find the legendary 'Dawnbringer' lost in the corrupted realm of Umbris
- Immerse yourself in a richly illustrated world with compelling dialogue and meaningful choices
- Shape the fate of a desperate world through your actions

Complete Gaming Experience

- Unlock all cards and classes with your purchase - no microtransactions!
- Open up new exciting area's with optional expansion packs for even more content
- Enjoy a premium game free from ads, timers, or pay-to-win mechanics

Endless Replayability

- Every run is unique with randomized encounters and battles
- Unlock new starting cards, portraits, and challenges
- Test your skills with increasing difficulty levels

Join the Dawncaster Community

- Connect with fellow players and developers on the Discord server
- Share strategies, get the latest updates, and influence the game's future
- Be part of a passionate community that's shaping the future of Dawncaster

Ready to answer the call? Download Dawncaster now and begin your legendary journey!

Discord: https://discord.gg/pfeMG9c
Website: https://dawncaster.wanderlost.games

mo.releaseNotes:
1.修復了遊戲打開時，偶爾會黑屏的bug
2.優化了遊戲的效能表現
mo.description:
探索神秘地圖，尋找巨龍蹤跡！
完成任務，收集資源，升級獵人技能。
解鎖祕密，戰勝強敵，成為最強獵龍者！

Mental clutter drains your energy. Bother Bin lets you offload anxious thoughts and record your progress, transforming chaos into organized achievement—one small victory after another.

Bother Bin isn’t a task list or To-Do app. The goal isn’t to “check off” items, but to continuously explore. Even if an attempt doesn’t solve the problem, it’s worth leaving a footprint to remind yourself you’re always moving forward.

Why People Love It

“Can’t live without it anymore! I’ve written all my recent anxieties here, and watching them get solved one by one gives me so much hope in life!”
“It’s the best app I’ve ever used. Deceptively simple interface, incredibly powerful results. My whole life feels more organized now!”
“Whenever I can’t sleep, I open the app, dump my thoughts, and drift off.”
“Seeing each tiny win time-stamped keeps me motivated to finish.”

Key Features
	•	One-Tap Brain Dump – Capture any thought, worry, or idea before it spirals.
	•	Time-Stamped Progress Log – Record every small win and see momentum build along an auto-sorted timeline.
	•	Smart Status Chips – Switch between Idea, In Progress, and Solved to stay laser-focused.
	•	100 % Offline Storage – Data stays on your device only. No ads, no tracking, no cookies or data collection. No Internet connection required.
	•	Light & Dark Modes – Easy on the eyes, automatically follows your system theme.

Perfect For
	•	Overthinkers & Insomniacs who need instant mind relief.
	•	ADHD Makers & Creatives who work best by offloading rapid-fire ideas.
	•	Procrastinators who break the paralysis with micro-progress tracking.
	•	Startup Founders & Product Builders tracking daily execution.
	•	Worry Warriors who transform daily stress into manageable action steps.
	•	Learners & Habit-Hackers who stay motivated by watching solved counts climb.

Your success story begins with a single worry recorded and transforms into countless victories celebrated. Every small step forward is rewriting what’s possible in your life. Download Bother Bin today and give your mind the space it deserves.

mo.description:
Dawncaster: Epic Deck-Building Adventure

Dive into a world of strategy and magic in Dawncaster, the ultimate deck-building experience with over 900 stunning hand-illustrated cards. Will you become a shadow-dancing rogue, an indomitable warrior, a mysterious Seeker, or forge your own path? Unravel the dark secrets of Aethos in this tactical masterpiece that revolutionizes mobile card gaming.

Redefining Card Games

- Experience groundbreaking mechanics that seasoned players will love
- Blend unique class abilities with powerful weapons and enchantments
- Master an innovative energy system, freeing you from traditional deckbuilder constraints

A World Shrouded in Mystery

- Embark on a quest to find the legendary 'Dawnbringer' lost in the corrupted realm of Umbris
- Immerse yourself in a richly illustrated world with compelling dialogue and meaningful choices
- Shape the fate of a desperate world through your actions

Complete Gaming Experience

- Unlock all cards and classes with your purchase - no microtransactions!
- Open up new exciting area's with optional expansion packs for even more content
- Enjoy a premium game free from ads, timers, or pay-to-win mechanics

Endless Replayability

- Every run is unique with randomized encounters and battles
- Unlock new starting cards, portraits, and challenges
- Test your skills with increasing difficulty levels

Join the Dawncaster Community

- Connect with fellow players and developers on the Discord server
- Share strategies, get the latest updates, and influence the game's future
- Be part of a passionate community that's shaping the future of Dawncaster

Ready to answer the call? Download Dawncaster now and begin your legendary journey!

Discord: https://discord.gg/pfeMG9c
Website: https://dawncaster.wanderlost.games

tw.releaseNotes:
• TWO LEVELS FREE: Play the first two levels of Lara’s Aztec adventure for free, then unlock levels 3-14 and all DLC via a single in-app purchase.
• Fixes a number of minor issues.
tw.description:
READ BEFORE DOWNLOADING: Please expand this description and read the full list of supported devices below to confirm that your device is supported.

TWO LEVELS FREE
Play the first two levels of Lara’s Aztec adventure for free, then unlock levels 3-14 and all DLC via a single in-app purchase.

===

Battle, platform and puzzle your way through the Mexican jungle in an action-packed tomb-raiding adventure. Explore temples, traverse toxic swamps and navigate volcanic caverns to defeat Xolotl, the Keeper of Darkness, before he plunges the world into eternal night.

DUAL PISTOLS AND TWIN STICKS
Carve a path through undead hordes in fast-paced combat, and bolster your arsenal with unlockable weapons and superpowered relics.

BRAIN TEASING AND CHASM LEAPING
Leap, grapple and swing your way past cunning puzzles and trap-laden challenges.

SOLO ACTION OR CO-OP CAPERS
Save the world solo or bring a friend for seamless multiplayer, via local network or online.

PICK UP AND PLAY — AGAIN AND AGAIN!
Beat high scores, tackle side objectives and discover hidden collectables on every level.

TOUCHSCREEN OR GAMEPAD CONTROLS
Customise the touchscreen controls to taste, or connect your favourite gamepad.

===

We recommend playing Lara Croft and the Guardian of Light on iOS 17 or later. You need 4GB of free space on your device, though we recommend at least double this to avoid initial installation issues.

Supported iPhones:  

 • iPhone XR and later
 • iPhone SE 2nd Generation (2020) and later

Supported iPads:  

 • iPad mini 5th Generation (2019) and later
 • iPad Air 3rd Generation (2019) and later
 • iPad 7th Generation (2019) and later
 • iPad Pro 2nd Generation (2017) and later

• If you require assistance, please contact our support team at support@feralinteractive.com

LARA CROFT AND THE GUARDIAN OF LIGHT © 2010, 2025 Crystal Dynamics group of companies. All rights reserved. LARA CROFT AND THE GUARDIAN OF LIGHT, THE GUARDIAN OF LIGHT, LARA CROFT, TOMB RAIDER, CRYSTAL DYNAMICS, and the CRYSTAL DYNAMICS logo are registered trademarks or trademarks of the Crystal Dynamics group of companies. Developed for and published on iOS by Feral Interactive Ltd. iOS and the iOS logo are trademarks of Apple Inc, registered in the U.S. and other countries. Feral and the Feral logo are trademarks of Feral Interactive Ltd. All other trademarks are the properties of their respective owners. All rights reserved.

tw.releaseNotes:
- Performance Improvements.
- Bug fixes.

Previous updates
- Creativity and innovation always feed off each other, which is Luwian's primary vision. Luwian's new cutting-edge Third EYE feature will help you design the perfect frame by quantifying and visualizing where people are likely to look in an image. To activate the Third EYE feature, use the eye button in photography mode.
tw.description:
Luwian 是一款複雜的相機應用程序，旨在提供對相機硬體的完全手動控制，從而使用戶能夠使用 DSLR 設計釋放他們的創造力。此外，該應用程式還附帶 Luwian Raw Magic Lite 後處理編輯器，可提高影像品質。

Luwian 提供的手動控制包括曝光、對焦、對焦鎖定、變焦和白平衡，以及預設和自訂調整選項、ISO 和快門速度。該應用程式還提供對 40 個濾鏡、29 個虛擬 FX、17 個模擬電影和 36 個經典電影色調的訪問，這些都可以在主相機面板上輕鬆使用。

Luwian 是業餘和專業攝影師的強大工具，提供一系列功能，使他們能夠輕鬆捕捉令人驚嘆的影像。其直覺的介面確保用戶可以輕鬆導航應用程式並存取其功能，而其手動控制使他們能夠對相機硬體進行精確控制。透過 Luwian，攝影師可以精確、清晰地捕捉他們的視覺，使其成為攝影領域人士的理想工具。

主要面板特點：

曝光控制
對焦+對焦鎖定控制
飛漲
白平衡
國際標準化組織
快門速度
目標網格
全螢幕
方位指示器
目前解析度指示器
手電筒模式：自動/開/關
閃光模式：自動/開/關
相機切換選單
錄影切換按鈕：普通/慢動作/縮時
快門按鈕
視訊錄製按鈕
雙鏡頭錄製模式（僅限 iPhone 11 及更高版本）
真實深度背景相機（僅限 iPhone 11 及更高版本）
快門定時器
手動模式
自動模式
人像模式（僅限 iPhone 11 及更高版本）
類比電影模式
電影色調濾鏡模式
經典濾鏡與視覺特效
選單
盧維安原始魔法精簡版


所有 Raw Magic Lite 功能：

導入/選擇/刪除
媒體 EXIF 資訊和詳細信息
照片編輯裁剪調整大小
影片編輯裁切調整大小（測試版）
照片/影片調整
照片/影片通用濾鏡與視覺特效
照片/影片類比濾鏡
照片/影片電影色調濾鏡


所有設定功能：

照片品質設定
相機預設存取和錄影 FPS 設定
縮時攝影速度 2 倍至 10 倍
開啟和關閉主面板過濾器視圖
快門定時器設定為三秒。至 15 秒。
關於部分和支援頁面的鏈接

us.releaseNotes:
- Performance Improvements.
- Bug fixes.

Previous updates
- Creativity and innovation always feed off each other, which is Luwian's primary vision. Luwian's new cutting-edge Third EYE feature will help you design the perfect frame by quantifying and visualizing where people are likely to look in an image. To activate the Third EYE feature, use the eye button in photography mode.
us.description:
Luwian is a sophisticated camera application designed to provide complete manual control over camera hardware, thus empowering the user to unleash their creativity using DSLR design. Additionally, the app comes with the Luwian Raw Magic Lite post-processing editor, which enhances the quality of images.

The manual controls offered by Luwian include exposure, focus, focus lock, zoom, and white balance, with both preset and custom adjustment options, ISO, and shutter speed. The app also provides access to 40 filters, 29 virtual FX, 17 analog films, and 36 classic movie tones, which are all readily available on the main camera panel.

Luwian is a powerful tool for both amateur and professional photographers, offering an array of features that allow them to capture stunning images with ease. Its intuitive interface ensures that users can easily navigate the app and access its features, while its manual controls enable them to exercise precise control over the camera hardware. With Luwian, photographers can capture their vision with precision and clarity, making it an ideal tool for those in the field of photography.

Main Panel Features :

Exposure control
Focus + focus lock control
Zoom
White balance 
ISO 
Shutter speed 
Target grid
Fullscreen
Orientation indicator
Current resolution indicator
Torch mode: auto / on / off
Flash mode: auto / on / off
Camera switch menu
Video recording switch button: Normal / Slow Motion / Time-lapse
Shutter button
Video recording button
Dual camera recording mode (only iPhone 11 and later models)
True depth backdrop camera (only iPhone 11 and later models)
Shutter Timer
Manual mode
Auto mode
Portrait mode (only iPhone 11 and later models)
Analog film mode
Cinetone filter mode
Classic filters and VFX
Menu
Luwian Raw Magic Lite


All Raw Magic Lite Features :

Import / Select / Delete
Media EXIF info and details
Photo edit crop resize
Video edit crop resize (BETA)
Photo / Video adjust 
Photo / Video general filters and VFX 
Photo / Video analog filters 
Photo / Video cinetone filters 


All Settings Features :

Photo quality setup
Camera preset access and video recording FPS setup
Time-lapse speed 2x to 10x 
Turn on and off the main panel filter view 
The shutter timer is set up from three sec. to 15 sec.
About section and link to support page

us.trackName: 真武三国  英雄集结
us.releaseNotes: 一修复活动单笔赠送显示不全的问题
us.description:
游戏特色：
1）Q版水墨风！
角色，场景，UI均采用中国古典水墨风格，高端大气上档次，低调奢华有内涵。
2）百名武将，绝无雷同！
超过一百位绝无雷同的武将和技能，考验英雄组合，操作和策略。
3）合体技系统！
痛快淋漓的合体技系统，简单刺激的触发方式，给您前所未有的战斗体验。
4）六大职业系统！
六大职业，五大势力，职业定位更加明确，玩法更加多变。
5）九大模式！
战役，挑战，竞赛，无双，奇境，试炼，八阵，领地，袭击九大创新模式，等您来战。


※ 如有任何问题和建议，可通过以下方式联系我们，我们一定尽快给您答复！祝您游戏愉快！
QQ交流群1：9222266
QQ交流群2：758352295
QQ交流群3：203399926

微信公众账号：oneonegames
us.trackCensoredName: 真武三国  英雄集结

us.releaseNotes: Fixed issue with Researched and Developed achievement not always being rewarded.
us.description:
MOTORSPORT MANAGER 4: MASTER RACE STRATEGY

BUILD YOUR RACING DYNASTY
Immerse yourself in the captivating journey of constructing your motorsport empire from the ground up, where every choice holds the key to your success.

ASSEMBLE YOUR DREAM TEAM
Hand-pick exceptional drivers and engineer a world-class racing powerhouse. Collaborate closely with drivers to secure pole positions and craft pitstop strategies that lead to race domination.

REAL-TIME STRATEGY UNFOLDS
Experience the adrenaline-pumping action of races in real-time or navigate through intricate strategy screens. Swiftly adapt to ever-changing weather, unexpected crashes, and the emergence of safety cars.

UNLEASH VARIETY ON THE TRACK
Embark on thrilling GT and Endurance racing adventures across six distinct championships. Immerse yourself in the iconic beauty of Monaco's settings, rendered in breathtaking artistry.

DRIVERS TAKE CENTER STAGE
Step into the shoes of promising new drivers, delve into their statistics, and cultivate pivotal relationships. Navigate the revamped HQ, seize upgrade opportunities, and master the new part development system for an immersive journey.

YOUR JOURNEY, YOUR CHALLENGE
Embark on a motorsport odyssey where every choice shapes your destiny. Witness dynamic AI team movements and adjust the difficulty level as the game evolves with you.

SEIZE CONTROL, MAKE HISTORY
It's your opportunity to rewrite the annals of racing lore and etch your name into the history of motorsport. Motorsport Manager 4 empowers you like never before.

Dive into a world of strategy and magic in Dawncaster, the ultimate deck-building experience with over 900 stunning hand-illustrated cards. Will you become a shadow-dancing rogue, an indomitable warrior, a mysterious Seeker, or forge your own path? Redefining Card Games

A World Shrouded in Mystery

- Shape the fate of a desperate world through your actions

Complete Gaming Experience

- Unlock all cards and classes with your purchase - no microtransactions!
- Open up new exciting area's with optional expansion packs for even more content

Endless Replayability

- Unlock new starting cards, portraits, and challenges

Join the Dawncaster Community

Discord: https://discord.gg/pfeMG9c

Mental clutter drains your energy. Bother Bin lets you offload anxious thoughts and record your progress, transforming chaos into organized achievement—one small victory after another.

Bother Bin isn’t a task list or To-Do app. The goal isn’t to “check off” items, but to continuously explore. Even if an attempt doesn’t solve the problem, it’s worth leaving a footprint to remind yourself you’re always moving forward.

Why People Love It

“Can’t live without it anymore! I’ve written all my recent anxieties here, and watching them get solved one by one gives me so much hope in life!”
“It’s the best app I’ve ever used. Deceptively simple interface, incredibly powerful results. My whole life feels more organized now!”
“Whenever I can’t sleep, I open the app, dump my thoughts, and drift off.”
“Seeing each tiny win time-stamped keeps me motivated to finish.”

Key Features
	•	One-Tap Brain Dump – Capture any thought, worry, or idea before it spirals.
	•	Time-Stamped Progress Log – Record every small win and see momentum build along an auto-sorted timeline.
	•	Smart Status Chips – Switch between Idea, In Progress, and Solved to stay laser-focused.
	•	100 % Offline Storage – Data stays on your device only. No ads, no tracking, no cookies or data collection. No Internet connection required.
	•	Light & Dark Modes – Easy on the eyes, automatically follows your system theme.

Perfect For
	•	Overthinkers & Insomniacs who need instant mind relief.
	•	ADHD Makers & Creatives who work best by offloading rapid-fire ideas.
	•	Procrastinators who break the paralysis with micro-progress tracking.
	•	Startup Founders & Product Builders tracking daily execution.
	•	Worry Warriors who transform daily stress into manageable action steps.
	•	Learners & Habit-Hackers who stay motivated by watching solved counts climb.

Your success story begins with a single worry recorded and transforms into countless victories celebrated. Every small step forward is rewriting what’s possible in your life. Download Bother Bin today and give your mind the space it deserves.

Previous updates
- Creativity and innovation always feed off each other, which is Luwian's primary vision. Luwian's new cutting-edge Third EYE feature will help you design the perfect frame by quantifying and visualizing where people are likely to look in an image. To activate the Third EYE feature, use the eye button in photography mode.
tr.description:
Luwian is a sophisticated camera application designed to provide complete manual control over camera hardware, thus empowering the user to unleash their creativity using DSLR design. Additionally, the app comes with the Luwian Raw Magic Lite post-processing editor, which enhances the quality of images.

The manual controls offered by Luwian include exposure, focus, focus lock, zoom, and white balance, with both preset and custom adjustment options, ISO, and shutter speed. The app also provides access to 40 filters, 29 virtual FX, 17 analog films, and 36 classic movie tones, which are all readily available on the main camera panel.

Luwian is a powerful tool for both amateur and professional photographers, offering an array of features that allow them to capture stunning images with ease. Its intuitive interface ensures that users can easily navigate the app and access its features, while its manual controls enable them to exercise precise control over the camera hardware. With Luwian, photographers can capture their vision with precision and clarity, making it an ideal tool for those in the field of photography.

Main Panel Features :

Exposure control
Focus + focus lock control
Zoom
White balance 
ISO 
Shutter speed 
Target grid
Fullscreen
Orientation indicator
Current resolution indicator
Torch mode: auto / on / off
Flash mode: auto / on / off
Camera switch menu
Video recording switch button: Normal / Slow Motion / Time-lapse
Shutter button
Video recording button
Dual camera recording mode (only iPhone 11 and later models)
True depth backdrop camera (only iPhone 11 and later models)
Shutter Timer
Manual mode
Auto mode
Portrait mode (only iPhone 11 and later models)
Analog film mode
Cinetone filter mode
Classic filters and VFX
Menu
Luwian Raw Magic Lite

Import / Select / Delete
Media EXIF info and details
Photo edit crop resize
Video edit crop resize (BETA)
Photo / Video adjust 
Photo / Video general filters and VFX 
Photo / Video analog filters 
Photo / Video cinetone filters 


All Settings Features :

Photo quality setup
Camera preset access and video recording FPS setup
Time-lapse speed 2x to 10x 
Turn on and off the main panel filter view 
The shutter timer is set up from three sec. to 15 sec.

tr.description:
Dawncaster: Epic Deck-Building Adventure

Dive into a world of strategy and magic in Dawncaster, the ultimate deck-building experience with over 900 stunning hand-illustrated cards. Will you become a shadow-dancing rogue, an indomitable warrior, a mysterious Seeker, or forge your own path? Unravel the dark secrets of Aethos in this tactical masterpiece that revolutionizes mobile card gaming.

Redefining Card Games

- Experience groundbreaking mechanics that seasoned players will love
- Blend unique class abilities with powerful weapons and enchantments
- Master an innovative energy system, freeing you from traditional deckbuilder constraints

A World Shrouded in Mystery

- Embark on a quest to find the legendary 'Dawnbringer' lost in the corrupted realm of Umbris
- Immerse yourself in a richly illustrated world with compelling dialogue and meaningful choices
- Shape the fate of a desperate world through your actions

Complete Gaming Experience

- Unlock all cards and classes with your purchase - no microtransactions!
- Open up new exciting area's with optional expansion packs for even more content
- Enjoy a premium game free from ads, timers, or pay-to-win mechanics

Endless Replayability

- Every run is unique with randomized encounters and battles
- Unlock new starting cards, portraits, and challenges
- Test your skills with increasing difficulty levels

Join the Dawncaster Community

- Connect with fellow players and developers on the Discord server
- Share strategies, get the latest updates, and influence the game's future
- Be part of a passionate community that's shaping the future of Dawncaster

Ready to answer the call? Download Dawncaster now and begin your legendary journey!

Discord: https://discord.gg/pfeMG9c
Website: https://dawncaster.wanderlost.games

Mental clutter drains your energy. Bother Bin lets you offload anxious thoughts and record your progress, transforming chaos into organized achievement—one small victory after another.

Bother Bin isn’t a task list or To-Do app. The goal isn’t to “check off” items, but to continuously explore. Even if an attempt doesn’t solve the problem, it’s worth leaving a footprint to remind yourself you’re always moving forward.

Why People Love It

“Can’t live without it anymore! I’ve written all my recent anxieties here, and watching them get solved one by one gives me so much hope in life!”
“It’s the best app I’ve ever used. Deceptively simple interface, incredibly powerful results. My whole life feels more organized now!”
“Whenever I can’t sleep, I open the app, dump my thoughts, and drift off.”
“Seeing each tiny win time-stamped keeps me motivated to finish.”

Key Features
	•	One-Tap Brain Dump – Capture any thought, worry, or idea before it spirals.
	•	Time-Stamped Progress Log – Record every small win and see momentum build along an auto-sorted timeline.
	•	Smart Status Chips – Switch between Idea, In Progress, and Solved to stay laser-focused.
	•	100 % Offline Storage – Data stays on your device only. No ads, no tracking, no cookies or data collection. No Internet connection required.
	•	Light & Dark Modes – Easy on the eyes, automatically follows your system theme.

Perfect For
	•	Overthinkers & Insomniacs who need instant mind relief.
	•	ADHD Makers & Creatives who work best by offloading rapid-fire ideas.
	•	Procrastinators who break the paralysis with micro-progress tracking.
	•	Startup Founders & Product Builders tracking daily execution.
	•	Worry Warriors who transform daily stress into manageable action steps.
	•	Learners & Habit-Hackers who stay motivated by watching solved counts climb.

Your success story begins with a single worry recorded and transforms into countless victories celebrated. Every small step forward is rewriting what’s possible in your life. Download Bother Bin today and give your mind the space it deserves.
